name: KILLWARE - FPS PROTOTYPE
description: "Killware" is a First-Person Shooter focused in hectic movement. A tiny experiment I wanted to try with the genre after experimenting Neon White. Killwareis a Cyberpunk First-Person Shooter based in hell in which a mercenary uses The Killware, a malicious software to enter into the conscious of other people to produce mental-breakdowns. Trained anti-viruses will try to get in his way so it's on his power to get the job done in one piece or perish trough the intent.
